scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build/index.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && nyc tap --no-timeout ./build/test/*.test.js
scripts.directTest-sanity: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build/test/sanity.test.js
scripts.doc: npm run clean && npm run build && inchjs && cd build; tsccd ./; documentation readme --readme-file ../README.md --markdown-toc false --section API UnitMeasure.js
scripts.npm-publish: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run doc && bump -tpa README.md package.json npm-package.json && npm run test && npm run npm-prep && cd npm && npm publish
